MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Morrison Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:24pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working carrying out further investigation work on our network to find the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:10pm on Tuesday 26th January 2021.
